SWShaun Wq LimLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Typically it begins upon card activation or successful application, I believe. One way to avoid late fees and headaches wondering if you made payment for your credit card bill is... to call your credit card provider/bank to align the billing dates. For example, I have called AMEX to align the billing cycles of both my cards on the same day. Yes there will be some adjustments for a month or so until the cycles align.So be prepared to pay higher than usual credit card bills(as transactions will shift) during that period.2 comments1
